name: Rewardian
description: Making recognition easy for employees and managers alike with seamless technology, custom rewards, and a smooth user experience.
Headline: Motivate employee, celebrate people
ShortDescription: Employee recognition and rewards platform for businesses of all sizes.

Highlights.name: Program Design
Highlights.description: We get to know your company–its mission and values, culture, and goals–to design a recognition program built to fit you. From full communication strategies to custom rewards, we provide you with the tools to elevate and engage your workforce.

Highlights.name: Integrations
Highlights.description: Recognize employees where they already work. Eliminate the need to login to another app with single sign-on capabilities, HRIS, and hundreds more seamless app and database integrations.

Highlights.name: Custom Platform
Highlights.description: We eliminate the barrier of use by designing a recognition platform just for you. Your company, your values, your brand. One size does not fit all, so we have created a platform that can be shaped to fit your company needs.

enhanced_description: Rewardian is an employee recognition and rewards platform designed for businesses of all sizes, with a particular focus on large and global enterprises. It aims to make recognition easy for employees and managers through seamless technology, a smooth user experience, and custom reward options. The platform offers seamless integrations, including single sign-on, HRIS, and hundreds of app and database integrations, allowing recognition to occur where employees already work. A key differentiator is its custom program design, tailored to a company's unique mission, values, culture, and goals, providing full communication strategies and custom rewards. The platform itself is custom-built to fit company-specific needs, values, and brand, moving away from a one-size-fits-all approach.
